taskDescription: Use Figure 16.12 to explain why Friedel–Crafts alkylations often give polysubstitution but Friedel–Crafts acylations do not.
detailedSolution: Alkylbenzenes are more reactive than benzene itself, but acylbenzenes are less reactive.
